item.title: GitHub Unwrapped 2023
item.description: Created on GitHub Unwrapped, you can find anything related there. Result Summary Top language: C++ Javascript Python Issues: Opened: 1. Closed: 1. Others Contributions: 463. Most productive day: Thursday. Most productive hour: 1pm. Pull requests merged: 7. Repository Stared: 111. Many happened this year: my coding skills improved, I have remade some basic front-end websites, etc.. Kind of a successful year for me I guess. Anyways, Happy New Year 2024!

item.title: Reimu In A Nutshell
item.description: Yes, this is a shitpost (I have lost my mind after the final exams of the 12th grade first semester). About the gif below, I used media-to-ascii to convert the original to ascii video. âš Attention: I do not own any of these media, these were I found around the Internet. Me during the exams: Reimu dancing Reimu hugging Reimu in the Winter Reimu eating Reimu wishing you a nice day!

item.title: This website's older versions
item.description: 1.0: Release date: June 2023. This is the first version of my website when I started to learn front-end development. I glad it worked when I saw it online. Go to page 2.0 & 3.0: Release date: July 2023. As a beginner, I wanted to practice more with more complexity, so I made 2.0 and 3.0. I struggled while trying to make it responsive but it worked somehow. Go to page 4.

item.title: How to install Oh My Posh on Windows
item.description: About Oh My Posh Oh My Posh is a prompt theme engine for any shell, makes your terminal looks better than its default interface. For example: Installation Oh My Posh: To download ohmyposh.exe and all the themes, open a powershell window and run: winget install JanDeDobbeleer.OhMyPosh -s winget Font: After that, you will need a suitable font. I recommend you should use Fire Code font. Setting up Font: You can change the font on the terminal by doing:

item.title: My PC Configuration
item.description: Faster Windows: Tweak Windows: Winaero Tweaker. Remove bloatware: Bloatbox. Editor: Visual Studio Code with Theme: One Dark Pro. Extensions: Competitive Programming Helper, CodeSnap, Better Comments. Apps: Crystal Disk Info: A SSD/HDD utility software. Everything: Better files/folders search. Notepad++: Extra text editor. K-Lite Codec: Media player. Oh My Posh: Customize Windows terminal, you can read my note on how to install Oh My Posh here. PowerTunnel: An extensible proxy server. & more on my GitHub stared repositories.

item.title: Settings
item.description: Background Image: . Theme: . Other informations Avatar by Yomou on pixiv. Background source by WANEELLA. 404NotFound.png by SAWARATSUKI on vtuberlogos.alfon.dev. Hosting on GitHub. Domain registered at: is-a.dev (free). Static site generator: hugo. Template: risotto (modified). Font: Cascadia Code Mono. Theme color: catppuccin (mocha) & base16-light. Source code available at caodoc/caodoc.github.io.
